executable.title: ClipModelEnds
executable.description: Clip surface points using 2 planes normal to z axis.
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by NIH grants ...

file.name: meshName
file.label: Input mesh
file.description: Surface mesh that defines the triangulation of the object in the segmented image

float.name: offset1
float.label: Plane offset 1
float.description: Offset of the first plane to cut the point set

float.name: offset2
float.label: Plane offset 2
float.description: Offset of the second plane to cut the point set
